about_the_game:
Ben Carter - Harmonic Realms Music Pack is an orchestral music pack designed for use with the RPG Maker series containing 14 unique tracks and 6 short music effects. The compositions provide a unique atmosphere and feel to the users own creations. Ranging from epic battles, pleasant towns or dangerous dungeons, you can select the perfect track to fit your own.

• Instruments; violins, cellos, flutes, trumpets, pianos, taikos, drums, harps, and many more!

• Tracks; 5 town, 2 theme, 2 battle (with 2 separate encounters), 1 fanfare, 2 cavern, 2 field, 4 ‘find’ or ‘action complete’ short pieces.

• Entirely original compositions inspired by incredible games from the 1990s.

Features:

* 14 BGM in ogg, m4a file formats.
* 6 ME or SE in ogg, m4a file formats.

Terms of Use:
* This pack is for use in the RPG Maker Series.
* OK to be used in Commercial Projects.
* Contents can be edited.
* OK for use in games with gore.
